title: Expose Member ID in coach UI so coaches can find and share it

requirements.text: Update the coach-facing Member Profile page to clearly display the Member ID (the member profile `id`) with an explicit English label "Member ID" near the top of the page, so a coach can easily find it after creating a member.

quotes: there is no option in the app that says member ID

acceptanceCriteria: When a coach opens a member profile (frontend/src/members/MemberProfilePage.tsx), the page shows a visible "Member ID" label and the member's `id` value.
The Member ID is visible without scrolling on typical mobile viewport sizes (placed in the header area near the member name/program).
All user-facing text related to this change is in English (e.g., "Member ID").

requirements.text: Update the coach-facing Members list cards to include the Member ID with an explicit English label "Member ID" so coaches can find it even without opening the profile.

quotes: there is no option in the app that says member ID

acceptanceCriteria: On the Members list page (frontend/src/members/MemberListPage.tsx), each member card displays "Member ID" and the member's `id` value.
The Member ID display does not break the card layout; if long, it is truncated/wrapped in a readable way.
All user-facing text related to this change is in English.

requirements.text: Add a one-tap "Copy" action for Member ID in the coach-facing member profile header to make it easy to share with the member.

quotes: there is no option in the app that says member ID

acceptanceCriteria: On the Member Profile page, the coach can click/tap a "Copy" button next to the displayed Member ID.
Tapping "Copy" copies the exact Member ID string to the clipboard.
The UI provides a clear English confirmation state/message (e.g., "Copied") after copying.

constraints: Do not modify files in frontend.immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Do not change how Member IDs are generated (currently using the member profile `id`, created in the frontend as `member_${Date.now()}` when creating a new member).
Do not add member self-registration or change authentication flows as part of this request.
Do not add external integrations (SMS/WhatsApp APIs, email, etc.) as part of this request.
